revision.comment: Created page with "'''{{struct|Sector}}''' double, Sector, F3DFloor '''NextLowestFloorAt'''(double ''x', double ''y'', double ''z'', int ''flags'' = 0, double ''steph'' = 0) ==Usage== Returns..."
revision.text:
'''{{struct|Sector}}'''
double, Sector, F3DFloor '''NextLowestFloorAt'''(double ''x', double ''y'', double ''z'', int ''flags'' = 0, double ''steph'' = 0)
==Usage== Returns the lowest floor closest to the specified position.
===Parameters=== {{: FFCF parameters}} *{{c|double ''steph''}} :{{moreinfo}}
===Return values=== * double :The absolute Z position of the lowest floor closest to the specified position. * Sector :Pointer to the {{struct|Sector}} with the lowest floor closest to the specified position. * F3DFloor :Pointer to the {{struct|F3DFloor|3D floor}} with the lowest floor closest to the specified position (can be null).
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Sector]] [[Category:ZScript map data]]
